Posts.Content: Jun 1, 2011 03:49PM - edited Jun 1, 2011 03:50PM by SuziePA I had a sentinal node biopsy last Monday as part of my mastectomy and reconstruction, and as promised by my breast surgeon, everything was done while I was "under" and I felt absolutely nothing.

Posts.Content: Aug 12, 2011 12:56PM SuziePA wrote: I had mammograms, sonograms and an MRI on the same morning. The results were ready for my surgeon's appointment that afternoon. I think I had the mammograms done first.
